 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַל‎</span> **verb** ==labour, toil== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***labour, make***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמל‎</span> ***work*** (? noun or verb) [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. No. 250</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲמַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמל‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nîmelu***</u></abbr>, ***gain***, ***possessions***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Eccl.2.21|Eccl 2:21]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽמְלָה‎</span> [[Prov.16.26|Prov 16:26]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַלְתָּ‎</span> [[Jonah.4.10|Jonah 4:10]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַלְתִּי‎</span> [[Eccl.2.11|Eccl 2:11]] + 2 t.; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽמְלוּ‎</span> [[Ps.127.1|Ps 127:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲמֹל‎</span> [[Eccl.1.3|Eccl 1:3]] + 3 t.; — ***labour*** (very late): in building [[Ps.127.1|Ps 127:1]] tillage, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Jonah.4.10|Jonah 4:10]] generally, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Eccl.2.21|Eccl 2:21]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.16.26|Prov 16:26]]; [[Eccl.5.15|Eccl 5:15]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> + infinitive [[Eccl.8.17|Eccl 8:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמָלוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁיַּעֲמֹל‎</span> [[Eccl.1.3|Eccl 1:3]]; [[Eccl.5.17|Eccl 5:17]], compare [[Eccl.2.11|Eccl 2:11]]; [[Eccl.2.19|Eccl 2:19]]; [[Eccl.2.20|Eccl 2:20]]. 



<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6001|עָמֵל]]</big>**</small>

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמֵל‎</span> **verbal adjective** ==toiling==, only Ecclesiastes, as predicate; — [[Eccl.2.18|Eccl 2:18]]; [[Eccl.2.22|Eccl 2:22]]; [[Eccl.3.9|Eccl 3:9]]; [[Eccl.4.8|Eccl 4:8]]; [[Eccl.9.9|Eccl 9:9]].
